topic.title: Scheduler
topic.section:
The Conference Manager can use Scheduler to make arrangements of times and locations regarding conference presentations and any other events. First define buildings and rooms for each building; create any special events; then click on Scheduling Presentations on Scheduler page, those in presentations queue are shown on a list, ready to be designated times and locations. For each on the list, check the boxes of location and time, then select building and room, and date, start time and end time from dropdown menu.

The scheduled presentations can be sorted by Start Time, Author, Location, or Title.
